articles.title: Rise of Taliban 2.0 will turn India into frontline state against terror - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Victory for Taliban in Afghanistan will not only destabilise South Asia but will have a global ramification akin to rise of Islamic State in Syria and Levant in 2014. | World News
articles.content: After the withdrawal of US-NATO forces from Afghanistan, the Taliban appear to be on a rampage in the strife torn country with the insurgent force capturing the exit points over Amu Darya to neighbou… [+3013 chars]

articles.title: South Korea in talks with mRNA vaccine makers to make up to 1B doses – gov't official - Rappler
articles.description: If agreed, the plan eases the tight global supply of COVID-19 vaccines, particularly in Asia
articles.content: The plan, if agreed, would help ease tight global supply of COVID-19 vaccines, particularly in Asia which lags North America and Europe in vaccine rollouts, and put South Korea a step closer to its a… [+54 chars]

articles.title: South Korea in talks with mRNA Covid-19 vaccine makers to produce up to 1 billion doses - The Straits Times
articles.description: The plan will help ease tight global supply of Covid-19 vaccines, particularly in Asia. . Read more at straitstimes.com.

articles.title: Mumbai most stressful major city to live in, Singapore top for mental health, new league table shows - AsiaOne
articles.description: A new league table shows Mumbai in India is the most stressful major city to live in, and Hong Kong is not much better. At the opposite end of the scale, Reykjavik in Iceland is the world’s lowest-stress city. The compilers of the table of 100 cities say Hong…
